{"id":479772898,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1618245881,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/479772898/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"6.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int m = word1.size(), n = word2.size(), i, j;\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(2, vector<int>(n+1, 0));\n        \n        for(i = 0; i <= n; i++)\n            dp[0][i] = i;\n        \n        for(i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n            dp[i%2][0] = i;\n            for(j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n                if (word1[i-1] == word2[j-1])\n                    dp[i%2][j] = dp[(i-1)%2][j-1];\n                else\n                    dp[i%2][j] = 1 + min(dp[(i-1)%2][j-1], min(dp[(i-1)%2][j], dp[i%2][j-1]));\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return dp[m%2][n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance"}
